title: Benjamin Crump Interview, Joe Biden Interview, Ask The CLO and more.
itunes:title: Benjamin Crump Interview, Joe Biden Interview, Ask The CLO and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! How did the show go from the dark side of ignorance to using fly swatters? The Chief Love Officer has some truth for a woman that is dating a married man dealing with custody issues. Civil Rights Attorney Benjamin Crump calls into the show to talk about the sham grand jury in the Breonna Taylor case along with other inconsistencies and injustices in Louisville, KY. Uncle Joe sits down with Uncle Steve to discuss several topics including 45's COVID-19 response, Kamala Harris and the Biden-Harris plan for Black America. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about the truth in a video posted by Kevin Hart about something 45 has specifically done, with the best counter act, being, us voting.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
